name: Video-Player
description: Music allow you to Video/Audio stream music trought the telegram voice chat feature.

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string from account

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

ASS_ID.description: fill with telegram id of account

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: create a private group and get the group id, add your bot as admin to the group too

SUDO_USERS.description: add @Zaid2_Robot and Type /id fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

MONGO_DB_URI.description: fill with the mongodb url get from mongodb.cloud.com (don't use mine below !)
